plantit.user package¶

Package extends the base django.contrib.auth.models.User to include a user Profile.

Follows the work of https://simpleisbetterthancomplex.com/tutorial/2016/07/22/how-to-extend-django-user-model.html#onetoone

Submodules¶

plantit.user.models module¶

class plantit.user.models.Profile(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Extends the base django.contrib.auth.models.User to include a user Profile.

The user this profile belongs

Type

The city the user is located

Type

The user’s institution or company affiliation.

Type

str

pinned_jobs¶

The jobs the user has pinned in the front end user interface

Type

ManyToManyField

ManyToManyField

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
plantit.user.models.create_user_profile(sender, instance, created, **kwargs)[source]¶

Post-Create hook for django User objects that creates a repective profile object for the user.

plantit.user.models.save_user_profile(sender, instance, **kwargs)[source]¶

Post-Save hook for django User objects that updates the respective profile object when the user object is saved.
